member.name: M:HelperFunctions.IsRunningOnQuest
member.summary: Returns true if the operating system is Meta Quest Checks for "Quest" or "Oculus" or "Meta" in the device name

member.name: T:MetaPassthroughToggler
member.summary: This combines the FB Passthrough with a UI window to toggle it on and off It needs to be called before StereoKit is initialized

member.name: M:MetaPassthroughToggler.DrawPassthroughTogglerUI
member.summary: Call this on every frame you want to see it
